If you’re ready, please share 1–2 examples of projects where you owned the outcome end-to-end (scope, stakeholders, metrics/results), and your availability this week. If you’d like to proceed formally, you can submit an application as well and we’ll review promptly.

Timeline: we’re actively reviewing candidates now and aiming to make a decision within the next 1–2 rounds of conversations/applications.

If you’d like, reply with 2–3 brief bullets on your most relevant projects/impact and any start-date constraints, and feel free to submit a formal application when ready so we can evaluate you in the same pipeline as other candidates.

Hi Company_B team—thank you for the guidance. I’m ready to formally apply.

- High-quality delivery + measurable outcomes: shipped improvements that increased reliability and reduced recurring issues through better instrumentation and process follow-through.

Company_B is my top choice, and I’d be excited to move forward—please let me know next steps or any info I should provide to support evaluation. [APPLY]
